HeroSection.tagLine: Where ideas meet innovation — creating digital products that not only work, but provide long-term value and impact.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.firstParagraph: Hi, I'm Gifari Fajar Maulana, a <highlight>fullstack developer and front-end developer</highlight> passionate about building <highlight>modern, interactive, and responsive</highlight> web applications. I'm currently studying at Politeknik LP3I Jakarta, focusing on both front-end and back-end development to create <highlight>meaningful digital experiences</highlight>.
AboutSection.secondParagraph: I’m deeply passionate about <highlight>continuous learning</highlight> and staying updated with the <highlight>latest technologies</highlight>. Each project I take on is a chance to explore <highlight>creative ideas</highlight>, sharpen my <highlight>technical skills</highlight>, and deliver <highlight>effective solutions</highlight> to real-word challenges in digital space.
AboutSection.thirdParagraph: Beyond functionality, I also focus on <highlight>design and user experience (UI/UX)</highlight> to ensure every digital product I build is not only efficient but also <highlight>engaging and intuitive</highlight> to use. I believe technology is more than just a tool — it’s a <highlight>bridge between ideas and meaningful</highlight> impact for people.
AboutSection.subTitle: Tech Stack

ContactSection.title: Lets Connect
ContactSection.secondDescription: Every great project starts with a simple conversation — let’s start ours.
